functionality.name: Product Display and Quotation Management
functionality.description: Features to display products, provide sorting and filtering options, and allow users to request quotations for products.

requirements.description: The system must display a list of products within a selected category with information such as product image, name, and price.
The system must show the original price, discounted price, and a percentage discount badge for products on sale.
The system must indicate financing availability for applicable products with a 'Financing available' label.
The system must display loyalty points that can be earned with each product purchase, e.g., 'Earn 1250 AgroPontos.'
The system must provide sorting options (e.g., 'Lowest Price,' 'Highest Price,' 'Best Rating') to dynamically update the product list.
Users must be able to favorite or save products by clicking a heart icon on the product card, which changes state when saved.
The system must allow users to apply multiple filters, including categories, official store names, ratings, locations, and price ranges.
The system must provide a toggle button to filter products offering free shipping.
The system must include a filter for 'Official Stores,' allowing users to select one or more stores from a list, with an expandable 'See more' option.
The system must offer a rating filter for products, allowing selection from 1 to 5 stars.
The system must provide a location filter to narrow down products based on a selected city or state.
The system must include a price filter with predefined ranges and a custom range option where users can specify minimum and maximum values.
Users must be able to view and remove currently selected filters, displayed at the top of the filter panel, with an 'X' button for each filter.
The system must include an 'Apply' button to apply selected filters and dynamically update the product list, and a 'Close' button to exit the filter panel without applying changes.
The system must provide a text input field labeled 'Description' where users can enter up to 400 characters about their requirements for a quotation.
The system must display an informational message guiding users to provide detailed information for an accurate quotation.
The system must include a 'Request Quote' button to submit the quotation request to the seller for review.
The system must provide a 'Cancel' button to allow users to exit the quotation process without submitting any information.
The system must validate the description input to ensure it is not empty and provide feedback if the field is incomplete.

epics.description: Display products with details such as price, discounts, and financing options.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view products in a selected category with image, name, and price.

tasks.description: Implement the UI to show product image, name, and price.
Create API endpoints to retrieve products based on selected category.
Implement logic to show original price, discounted price, and percentage discount badge.
Add a 'Financing available' label to products that offer financing.

epics.description: Allow users to sort and filter products by various criteria.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to apply filters for categories, ratings, location, price, etc.

tasks.description: Design the filter panel UI with options like categories, stores, ratings, etc.
Develop the logic to apply and combine multiple filters dynamically.
Display active filters at the top of the filter panel with an 'X' button for removal.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to sort products by price or rating.

tasks.description: Design the sorting options (Lowest Price, Highest Price, Best Rating).
Develop logic to sort products based on selected criteria.

epics.description: Enable users to favorite and save products for future reference.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save products by clicking a heart icon.

tasks.description: Include a heart icon on each product card for favoriting.
Toggle the state of the heart icon when a product is favorited or unfavorited.

epics.description: Allow users to request quotations for products by providing details.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to enter a description and request a quotation for a product.

tasks.description: Implement a text input field for the user to enter a description (up to 400 characters).
Ensure the description is not empty and provide feedback if necessary.
Add a 'Request Quote' button to submit the quotation request to the seller.
Add a 'Cancel' button to exit the quotation process without submitting.
